other_tests.findings: Cytology revealed the aspirated mediastinal lymph node to be negative for malignant cells.
Mucosal resection performed of the 1.5-cm esophageal nodule at the GE junction; lesion totally removed.
Esophagitis noted; brushings negative for malignancy.
Revealed polyps in the cecum and descending colon; EGD revealed 8-mm localized polyp at the GEJ with intestinal metaplasia.

No evidence of infarction, fracture, hemorrhage, edema, mass effect, or shift of normally midline structures. Minimal periventricular white matter hypodensities compatible with chronic microvascular ischemic disease.
